headline: Solventum Raises 2025 Guidance, Gets $82 PT from Wells Fargo After $4B P&F Business Sale
summary: Solventum Corporation (NYSE:SOLV) is one of the best new stocks to buy right now. On September 15, Wells Fargo raised the price target on Solventum to $82 from $79, while maintaining an Equal Weight rating on the shares. This sentiment by the firm was posted to reflect the sale of the company’s Purification & Filtration/P&F […]
